description: This is a fantasy feature update with Remy LeCroix. Remy has found herself in a financial bind and is squatting in an old abandoned factory until she can get back on her feet. The night comes to an end and she settles in to go to sleep. She can't sleep and masturbates to twisted fantasies of being taken by a stranger, restrained, and fucked like a filthy slut. This fantasy has taken over her dreams and is all that she thinks about. Her pussy drips at the thought of being completely helpless and being tormented by this stranger. Her screams excite him, and although she tries, no one can her hear her as she pleads with him to stop.
title: The Squatter
